html:
10.12.17  2:33 pm   rain is relief, releasing of a burden

     oh, i agree

10.12.17  2:32 pm   Why did you choose the font colour purple for questions? 

     because of the way it looks, visually

10.12.17  2:12 pm   im sorry about the things

     that's ok

10.12.17  1:39 pm   is it true that canada has square milimeters so small, that someone with a small bar of soap can clean canada with?

     i have heard that but i don't know if it's true

10.12.17  1:35 pm   How do stay focused after responding to quetions in such short intervals?

     i do not answer questions in short intervals, but i respect your opinion

10.12.17  1:30 pm   I showed this question page to my english teacher and she gave my quite a earful about misspelled ueqstions. Is this fair?

     no. title designs and graphics are allowed to have the letters in interesting arrangements. i purposely changed the color of the letter that has a different arrangement, to try to clarify that i am not simply changing the spelling, but i am overall doing a graphic design based on the letters in the word 'questions' which is the title of this page

10.12.17  1:05 pm   There are like 10 level of consciousness. What level are you on?

     there are actually more than 10 levels, and it is liquid. i am floating

10.12.17  12:02 pm   can you make up a new colour

     i will try

10.12.17  11:44 am   how do you recommend to start learning piano

     step one, find access to some kind of piano keyboard

10.12.17  11:22 am   I'm a terrible conversationalist because, when I try to talk to someone, I usually end up talking more to myself than to them. Yet, somehow, this seems to serve me well as a style in writing. Can you relate?

     somewhat

10.12.17  10:39 am   What is the reason for the early instrumentals? (sincere Sam, frontier cave, illuminated glass container, etc.)

     just sort of seeing what i was capable of, in terms of 'normal' sounding things, which were also loopable. because loopability was something that seemed so standard in popular music at the time (and still) although i have since moved away from loopability, realizing that i have some other important strengths that i can and should be bringing to the table

10.12.17  8:03 am   Are you using an aggregator for Spotify?

     yes. spotify does not let people send things directly to them

10.12.17  6:21 am   Is it possible for cows to lick bread?

     i thought so, but now that i think about it i'm not sure

10.12.17  4:14 am   are clouds sad when they rain?

     no

10.12.17  2:58 am   what would be some good questions to ask someone? (asking for a friend)

     something you want to know

10.12.17  2:21 am   Does the guy from the soap video have a name?

     i don't remember. you will have to check the video

10.12.17  2:05 am   how often do you upload things to your "reality" page on this website?

     i wish i could do it all the time but it takes a lot of hours to find and create reasonable clips, and it takes a lot of time away from making the regular videos

10.12.17  1:57 am   Can you describe your perfect partner?

     no

10.12.17  1:37 am   I can't upload to instagram anymore because I have a microsoft surface (and no smart phone) and instagram changed their minds on allowing you to upload using a microsoft surface (which is half tablet, half laptop). I was gaining a nice following on there, but now I have to do find a different way to share things with the world. It makes me feel sad that this was taken away from me over night, and it feels unfair (even though I know it isn't really unfair). should I try making youtube videos instead? or... another website that's even cooler than youtube?

     i think you should find a way to continue on instagram. last year instagram did a major update and it no longer worked on my phone, but i was able to borrow a phone and upload that way. instagram is very choosy, but if you are doing well and have a good following, i think you can find ways to get through

10.12.17  1:37 am   Is money the only way we can pay for value?

     no

10.12.17  1:37 am   How long has it been since you typed an uppercase letter?

     maybe a few minutes

     And can you gift me an uppercase letter of your choice? It would look very nice in a frame on my mantelpiece.

     here is the list of all the times i have used capital letters, in this questions section alone.

10.12.17  1:37 am   Do you entertain requests to commission videos,

     no

      and if so, how do we go about contacting you?

10.12.17  1:24 am   Do you just like, all the answers in life?

     what

      Or just a guy with a few too many minutes in his day.

     no, way too few actually. i wish i could produce videos and songs at a much much faster pace

10.12.17  1:11 am   why are you interested in soap?

     i am not

10.12.17  1:00 am   My math teacher said to go to hell do you know we're the directions are?

     look around you

10.12.17  12:55 am   Do numbers or letters have feelings?

     they are feelings

10.12.17  12:54 am   Why is blue, blue, and not red

     most things are themselves

10.12.17  12:38 am   how do you count? any methods on counting?

     you just have to memorize the list of integers

10.12.17  12:24 am   why didn't you sleep yesterday?

     i did, but i respect your opinion

10.12.17  12:18 am   What made you want to start making videos for YouTube?

     the videos are actually not made for youtube, they are made for my website. but i started posting them on youtube as well, due to pressure from society

10.11.17  10:58 pm   do you like talking on old phones?

     talking on land lines is much better because there is no delay. but i don't think there are any land lines in existence anywhere

10.11.17  10:55 pm   Use one word to describe soap

     i just released a video the other day that describes soap in at least 6 different ways. it hardly seems necessary to explain it again now. if you are looking for the video check my website

10.11.17  10:36 pm   how do you talk to people ?

     try to make up a new way

10.11.17  10:14 pm   Do a barrel roll

     i will do one when i get a chance

10.11.17  10:13 pm   What is the best substance to cover the surface of the earth with?

     water, maybe

10.11.17  10:11 pm   why do british people put a "u" in color?

     for extra flavour

10.11.17  10:10 pm   what is the best song ever played on the saxophone? 

     take 5

10.11.17  9:41 pm   would you continue to work as hard as you do if you got little no response from people for it?

     that's what i did for a long time

10.11.17  9:41 pm   Calm down

     ok

10.11.17  9:28 pm   Are things that are things really things?

     i would say so

     Because I stumbled across a thing doing a thing, and now, I cant get the thing doing the thing out of my head! So tell me, do things do things that other things can't do?

     sometimes

10.11.17  9:27 pm   i really want to make something significant of myself, do you think that's feasible?

     yes

10.11.17  9:19 pm   why is philadelphia the best city in america?

     because of the sandwiches from that one place

10.11.17  8:26 pm   What's your favourite flavour of chewing gum?

     calmunism

10.11.17  8:15 pm   do you answer stupid questions with dismissive answers just to be a smartass, or because you don't find them stupid?

     some sites have the ability to determine if a question is stupid, but this website does not have that feature. i just have to type whatever i think is reasonable, in response to each question

10.11.17  7:27 pm   does your family believe you when you tell them you're famous?

     i never told them, they found out on their own

10.11.17  6:48 pm   Are cowbells underrated?

     i don't know what their current rating is

10.11.17  6:29 pm   pick song number 5 in your list. if you say midnight is 0/12 and go by minutes the time is 5, modulo 12

     random dot org provides much easier and more reliable randomization services

10.11.17  6:28 pm   was "soap tips" secretly an advertisement to get people to buy soap?

     no

10.11.17  6:19 pm   i'm sorry for actually being serious, but, what is the most scariest thing you have ever done in your career?

     attempt to explain the history of the entire world in 1 video

10.11.17  6:15 pm   are you just a regular dude?

     no
